channel.title: Azure AI Foundry Model Updates
channel.description: Latest updates on Azure AI Foundry models sold directly by Azure

item.title: gpt-5.2-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model optimized for coding workflows, including Codex CLI and the Codex VS Code extension. It supports text and image processing, structured outputs, and advanced tool/function calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model for general-purpose chat and responses scenarios. It supports text and image processing, structured outputs, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2-chat
item.description: A GPT-5.2 chat model offered as a preview for Chat Completions and Responses APIs. It supports structured outputs and tool/function calling (including parallel tool calls) and is not recommended for production use while in preview.

item.title: gpt-5.1
item.description: A GPT-5.1-series reasoning model for Chat Completions and the Responses API with multimodal (text+image) input support. It includes structured outputs and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.1-chat
item.description: A GPT-5.1 chat model in preview that adds built-in reasoning capabilities. As a reasoning model, it does not support parameters like temperature and is not recommended for production while in preview.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.1 codex-optimized model available via the Responses API only, designed for coding and tool-driven workflows. It supports text and image processing, structured outputs, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5.1 codex-optimized model for Responses API-only coding scenarios. It supports multimodal input, structured outputs, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex tooling.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-max
item.description: A GPT-5.1 codex-optimized model for Responses API-only usage with expanded reasoning controls. It adds support for setting reasoning_effort to xhigh, and does not support reasoning_effort=none.

item.title: gpt-5
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model for Chat Completions and the Responses API with text and image processing. It supports structured outputs and advanced function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5 reasoning model intended to balance capability and cost while retaining multimodal input support. It supports structured outputs and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-5 reasoning model designed for efficiency while still supporting text and image processing. It includes structured outputs and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-chat
item.description: A GPT-5 chat model offered in preview for Chat Completions and the Responses API with text/image input and text-only output. A newer preview version (2025-10-03) adds enhanced emotional intelligence and mental health-oriented response behavior.

item.title: gpt-5-codex
item.description: A GPT-5 codex-optimized model available via the Responses API only, intended for agentic coding and tool use. It supports text/image input, structured outputs, and function/tool calling including parallel tool calls, and is optimized for Codex CLI and VS Code extension.

item.title: gpt-5-pro
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model for Responses API usage with structured outputs and multimodal processing. It supports functions and tools and targets high-capability reasoning workloads.

item.title: gpt-oss-120b
item.description: An open-weight reasoning model (preview) for text-in/text-out chat scenarios with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs. It is available for deployment and via managed compute, and requires a Foundry project to deploy.

item.title: gpt-oss-20b
item.description: A smaller open-weight reasoning model (preview) for text-in/text-out chat with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs. It is available via managed compute and Foundry Local.

item.title: gpt-4.1
item.description: A multimodal (text+image input) model supporting Chat Completions and the Responses API with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs. It offers a very large context window, with a documented known issue when tool/function definitions exceed 300,000 tokens.

item.title: gpt-4.1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-4.1-series multimodal model supporting Chat Completions and the Responses API with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs. It shares the same known issue affecting large tool/function definitions over 300,000 tokens.

item.title: gpt-4.1-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-4.1-series multimodal model for Chat Completions and the Responses API with streaming, function calling, and structured outputs. It shares the same known issue affecting large tool/function definitions over 300,000 tokens.

item.title: computer-use-preview
item.description: An experimental preview model trained specifically for the Responses API computer use tool. It can control mouse/keyboard via third-party libraries using screenshot context, and supports tools and streaming with text I/O and image input.

item.title: codex-mini
item.description: An o-series coding-focused model that is a fine-tuned version of o4-mini. It is available via the Responses API and supports structured outputs, text and image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3-pro
item.description: An o-series reasoning model designed for advanced problem solving with increased focus and capability. It supports the Responses API with structured outputs, text/image processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o4-mini
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model offering enhanced reasoning abilities for science, coding, and math tasks. It supports Chat Completions and the Responses API with structured outputs, multimodal processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities and support for parallel tool calling. It supports Chat Completions and the Responses API with structured outputs and text/image processing.

item.title: o3-mini
item.description: A smaller o-series reasoning model focused on efficient reasoning with structured outputs and tool/function support. It is text-only and targets tasks where lower cost and faster responses are important.

item.title: o1
item.description: An o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities, structured outputs, and support for text and image processing. It supports functions and tools for tool-augmented workflows.

item.title: o1-preview
item.description: An older preview version in the o1 series. It is available only to customers who were granted access as part of the original limited access program.

item.title: o1-mini
item.description: A faster and more cost-efficient o1-series option, positioned as ideal for coding tasks requiring speed and lower resource use. Global Standard deployment is available by default, while standard (regional) deployments are limited to select customers from the o1-preview limited access release.

item.title: gpt-4o
item.description: A GPT-4o (Omni) multimodal model that integrates text and images for improved responsiveness and accuracy. It supports structured outputs, JSON mode, and parallel function calling, and is noted for stronger non-English and vision performance.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini
item.description: A fast, inexpensive multimodal model positioned as an ideal replacement for GPT-3.5 Turbo series models. It supports text and image processing, JSON mode, and parallel function calling.

item.title: gpt-4 (turbo-2024-04-09)
item.description: GPT-4 Turbo with Vision is a generally available model usable only with the Chat Completions API. It replaces earlier GPT-4 preview vision models, with feature availability varying by input method and deployment type.

item.title: text-embedding-3-large
item.description: The latest and most capable embeddings model for converting text into vectors for similarity and retrieval. It supports a dimensions parameter to reduce embedding size for cost/performance control, and requires re-embedding when migrating from older models.

item.title: text-embedding-3-small
item.description: A third-generation embeddings model that improves multilingual retrieval performance while maintaining strong English performance. It supports reducing embedding dimensionality via the dimensions parameter for cost/performance tuning.

item.title: text-embedding-ada-002
item.description: A legacy embeddings model (versions 1 and 2) used to convert text into 1,536-dimension vectors. The documentation notes you cannot upgrade between embedding models; migrating to text-embedding-3-large requires generating new embeddings.

item.title: gpt-image-1
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model that creates images from text prompts and supports limited access preview. Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and it is available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: gpt-image-1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview. Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and it is available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: gpt-image-1.5
item.description: An updated GPT-image series image generation model in limited access preview. Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and it is available in select Global Standard regions.

item.title: dall-e-3
item.description: An image generation model that produces original images from natural language prompts. It is generally available for REST APIs, while some client SDK usage is noted as preview.

item.title: sora
item.description: A video generation model from OpenAI that creates realistic and imaginative video scenes from text instructions. It is offered in preview and available in specific Global Standard regions.

item.title: sora-2
item.description: A newer Sora video generation model that creates video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in specific Global Standard regions (East US 2 and Sweden Central).

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview audio model for audio and text generation. It supports large token inputs and is part of the GPT-4o audio models that enable low-latency conversational audio or audio generation.

item.title: gpt-4o-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview audio model for audio and text generation. It supports large token inputs and is intended for conversational audio or audio generation workflows.

item.title: gpt-4o-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o-family preview model for real-time audio processing. It supports streaming and is designed for low-latency speech interactions and real-time audio workflows.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o mini-family preview model for real-time audio processing. It targets low-latency speech interactions and real-time audio workflows with streaming support.

item.title: gpt-realtime
item.description: A generally available real-time audio model for low-latency audio processing. It is listed alongside related realtime and audio models for conversational and streaming audio scenarios.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini
item.description: A smaller real-time audio model intended for low-latency audio processing. It is listed with multiple versions, including a dated variant, for realtime conversational scenarios.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned variant of gpt-realtime-mini for real-time audio processing. It is listed as a specific dated model version for realtime conversational scenarios.

item.title: gpt-audio
item.description: An audio model listed for real-time audio processing scenarios. It is part of the set of Azure OpenAI audio models available via realtime, completions, and audio APIs.

item.title: gpt-audio-mini
item.description: A smaller audio model listed for real-time audio processing scenarios. It appears with multiple versions, including a dated variant, for audio workflows.

item.title: whisper
item.description: A general-purpose speech recognition model used for speech-to-text and speech translation via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o, available via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB for transcription.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o mini, available via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB for transcription.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize
item.description: A speech-to-text model that includes diarization/automatic speech recognition features. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB and is listed as a distinct model for enhanced transcription workflows.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned GPT-4o mini speech-to-text model with improved transcription accuracy and robustness. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB via the /audio API.

item.title: tts
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model optimized for speed. It is available via the /audio API for generating speech from text.

item.title: tts-hd
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model optimized for quality. It is available via the /audio API for higher-fidelity speech generation from text.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts
item.description: A preview text-to-speech model powered by GPT-4o mini that supports style/tone guidance. It is available via the /audio API for controllable voice generation.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned GPT-4o mini text-to-speech model (preview) that supports guiding the voice style or tone. It is listed as a dated variant for TTS workflows via the /audio API.

item.title: model-router
item.description: A Microsoft model that routes requests to underlying models based on the prompt, supporting text and image input with a large context window. It has multiple versions available and notes that max output tokens vary by the routed underlying model.

item.title: o3-deep-research
item.description: A specialized o-series model listed for deep research scenarios. It is currently only available with Foundry Agent Service per the documentation note.

item.title: FLUX.2-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs image generation and editing model that accepts text and image prompts and can use up to eight reference images via API. Key features include multi-reference support, more grounded outputs, and greater output flexibility, available through the BFL provider API.

item.title: FLUX.1-Kontext-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs in-context image generation/editing model supporting character consistency and advanced editing. It can be used via Azure Image API endpoints and the BFL provider API with provider-specific parameters like seed and aspect ratio.

item.title: FLUX-1.1-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs text-to-image model emphasizing fast inference speed, strong prompt adherence, and scalable generation. It is available via Azure Image API endpoints and the BFL provider API with provider-specific parameters such as width/height and seed.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-pro
item.description: A Cohere reranking/text-classification model that takes text input and returns JSON-formatted ranking outputs. It supports many languages and is available via Global Standard and managed compute deployments.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-fast
item.description: A faster Cohere reranking/text-classification model that returns JSON outputs for ranking tasks. It supports many languages and is available via Global Standard and managed compute deployments.

item.title: Cohere-command-a
item.description: A Cohere chat-completion model optimized for enterprise use cases like reasoning, summarization, and question answering. It supports tool calling and can return either text or JSON responses, with broad multilingual support.

item.title: embed-v-4-0
item.description: A Cohere embeddings model that supports both text and image inputs and outputs vectors in multiple selectable dimensions. It is designed for multilingual embedding and retrieval scenarios and is available in Global Standard deployments.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2-Speciale
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content designed for step-by-step reasoning tasks such as language, scientific reasoning, and coding. It supports text input/output with large context and returns text or JSON.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content for large-context reasoning workloads. It supports text input/output and returns text or JSON, with English and Chinese language support.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.1
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content that supports tool calling for tool-augmented reasoning. It supports large text input/output and returns text or JSON, with English and Chinese language support.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1-0528
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning chat-completion model with very large context and output limits, intended for complex reasoning tasks. It returns text responses and is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed deployments.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3-0324
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model that supports tool calling and large-context text input/output. It returns text or JSON and is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed deployments.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning chat-completion model with very large context and output limits, designed for step-by-step reasoning workloads. It returns text responses and is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed deployments.

item.title: Llama-4-Maverick-17B-128E-Instruct-FP8
item.description: A Meta Llama multimodal chat-completion model supporting text and image inputs with very large context and output limits. It is available in Global Standard deployments across all regions and returns text responses.

item.title: Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct
item.description: A Meta Llama chat-completion model for large-context text workloads with an 8,192-token output limit. It is available in Global Standard deployments across all regions and returns text responses.

item.title: MAI-DS-R1
item.description: A Microsoft chat-completion model with reasoning content designed for large-context reasoning tasks. It supports English and Chinese, returns text responses, and is available in Global Standard deployments across all regions.

item.title: Mistral-Large-3
item.description: A Mistral multimodal chat-completion model supporting text and image input with tool calling and text/JSON responses. It is available in Global Standard deployment in West US 3.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2505
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for extracting text from images or PDF pages (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It returns text/JSON/Markdown and is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US and EU).

item.title: Kimi-K2.5
item.description: A Moonshot AI multimodal reasoning model that accepts text and image input and returns reasoning content in chat completions. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard deployments across all regions.

item.title: Kimi-K2-Thinking
item.description: A Moonshot AI reasoning (thinking) model for chat completions with reasoning content. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard deployments across all regions.

item.title: grok-4
item.description: An xAI Grok reasoning model with advanced reasoning and tool-use capabilities for enterprise workloads. It supports tool calling, text responses, and is available in Global Standard deployments across all regions (registration required per the narrative).

item.title: grok-4-fast-reasoning
item.description: An efficiency-optimized Grok model variant that supports reasoning with lower latency and cost, including tool use and multimodal input. It is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-4-fast-non-reasoning
item.description: A Grok fast variant that can bypass reasoning for ultra-fast applications while still supporting tool use and multimodal input. It is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-code-fast-1
item.description: A fast and efficient xAI reasoning model designed for agentic coding applications, trained on coding-focused data and tool-use demonstrations with refusal behaviors. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard deployments across all regions (registration required per the narrative).

item.title: grok-3
item.description: An xAI Grok non-reasoning model tailored for business use cases like extraction, coding, and summarization with strong instruction following. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-3-mini
item.description: A lightweight xAI reasoning model for agentic coding, math, and deep science problems with test-time compute and tool use. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard (all regions) and Data Zone Standard (US).
